title: Last Flag
description: Hide your flag. Find the enemy flag. Run it back, then defend it for a minute to win. Welcome to Last Flag: a fast-paced 5v5 shooter with showstopping contestants, set in a televised competition where strategy, teamwork, and chaos blend in the ultimate game of Capture the Flag.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# ABOUT THIS GAME
<!--text-->
Last Flag is Capture the Flag, reimagined as a fun-first, fast-paced, third-person team shooter. Master powerful contestants, explore striking battlegrounds, and find your very own playstyle as you compete for glory in the world’s hottest gameshow.

<!--image-->
![Last Flag-a3676](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/bc91e678d421458c84b826f6f0c4756c/last-flag-a3676.png)

<!--image-->
![Last Flag-u9a4c](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/bc91e678d421458c84b826f6f0c4756c/last-flag-u9a4c.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
You’ve got 60 seconds to find a sneaky hiding spot for your flag—after that, it’s SHOWTIME! Work with your allies to take control of the map and stop the other team from finding your flag, all while hunting down theirs. The first team to bring home the opposing flag and successfully defend it claims the glory.

<!--image-->
![Last Flag-igm00](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/bc91e678d421458c84b826f6f0c4756c/last-flag-igm00.png)

<!--image-->
![Last Flag-1oaj3](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/bc91e678d421458c84b826f6f0c4756c/last-flag-1oaj3.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Master a legendary cast of contestants, each armed with primetime firepower and signature abilities. Experiment to find wild new ways to wield your powers, or combine them with teammates’ abilities to outwit, outplay, and outgun the competition. Spend cash to secure upgrades that will help you stay one step ahead in clashes for battleground dominance and the hunt for the opposing flag.

<!--image-->
![Last Flag-1p07e](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/bc91e678d421458c84b826f6f0c4756c/last-flag-1p07e.png)

<!--image-->
![Last Flag-rvalc](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/bc91e678d421458c84b826f6f0c4756c/last-flag-rvalc.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Cashbot crusher, radar tower tycoon, flag-running phenom, all-out brawler—how will YOU rise to stardom? Sure, sharp aim earns applause, but there are endless ways to push your team closer to victory. Lean into your strengths, lock in a play style that’s uniquely yours, and start racking up MVP moments.

<!--image-->
![Last Flag-116xd](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/bc91e678d421458c84b826f6f0c4756c/last-flag-116xd.png)

<!--image-->
![Last Flag-1uz2d](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/bc91e678d421458c84b826f6f0c4756c/last-flag-1uz2d.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
With the enemy flag in-hand, the pressure’s on! Run it back, plant it in your team’s home base, and prepare for mayhem. Over the next 60 seconds, you will need every ounce of might you can muster to fend off the enemy team. Dodge swirling tornadoes, meteoric bazooka blasts, and hailstorms of serrated feathers as you defend your prize. Make every second, and every bullet, count.

<!--image-->
![Last Flag-1vstg](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/bc91e678d421458c84b826f6f0c4756c/last-flag-1vstg.png)

<!--image-->
![Last Flag-1b5xg](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/bc91e678d421458c84b826f6f0c4756c/last-flag-1b5xg.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
A ghost town nestled in a forest canyon, a cozy mountain village blanketed in snow, ancient temples infused with dark magic—every map is a vibrant, handcrafted, and expansive world built for you to explore. Delve into winding caves, scale towering ruins, and peek behind waterfalls–just remember to stay focused on finding the flag. And don’t think too hard about anything that seems slightly. . .  out of place.
